note.p: Daughter of Joseph Strutt and his wife Isabella Douglas, of Derby. Married John Howard Galton in Derby in 1819.

England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 19 November 2015)
